select seq_id , prd_cd , brand_nm , prd_nm , jan_cd , now_prd_cnt , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') reg_dt , date_format(upd_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') upd_dt from jaiko_inventory_info
seq_id = #{seq_id}
and prd_cd like '%${prd_cd}%'
and prd_nm like '%${prd_nm}%'
and jan_cd like '%${jan_cd}%'
upd_dt between date_add(now(), interval -1 day) and now()
order by upd_dt desc, seq_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into jaiko_inventory_info (prd_cd, brand_nm, prd_nm, jan_cd, now_prd_cnt) values (#{prd_cd}, #{brand_nm}, #{prd_nm}, #{jan_cd}, #{now_prd_cnt})
